column2:
sb_2012_1 %>% 
  full_join(sb_2012_2) %>% 
  full_join(sb_2012_3) %>% 
  full_join(sb_2012_4) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(harvest_year = "2012") %>% 
  rename(desc = Region) %>% 
  filter(desc %in% c("(F) Sclerotia, %", "No. of samples")) %>% 
  distinct() %>%
 pivot_longer(cols = c(2:24),
               names_to = "region",
               values_to = "per_sclerotia")
